channel.title: CVE Feed for Imagely -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Imagely -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-39627|2024-08-02T18:18:55.754Z -- imagely -- nextgen%20gallery
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Imagely NextGEN Gallery allows Stored XSS.This issue affects NextGEN Gallery: from n/a through 3.59.3.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Imagely NextGEN Gallery allows Stored XSS.This issue affects NextGEN Gallery: from n/a through 3.59.3.
